statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_email FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY account_created_at ASC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_name LIKE 'A%' AND account_balance < 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_email, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_created_at DESC
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC
SELECT account_name, account_email, account_created_at FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers JOIN account_permissions ON customers.customer_id = account_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, created_at FROM customers INNER JOIN account_permissions ON customers.customer_id = account_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM account_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT update_id, update_date, update_details FROM account_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT permission_type, permission_level FROM account_permissions WHERE permission_id >= 5 ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT update_id, customer_id, update_date, update_details FROM account_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_updates JOIN customer_accounts ON account_updates.customer_id = customer_accounts.customer_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount, a.account_type FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC, balance ASC
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT account_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount < -500 ORDER BY account_id
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role = 'admin'
